name: Risky Manufacture
description:
Made for the Ludum Dare 49 - Compo 
Made in ~8 hours

-------------------------------

!!!PLAY THE WEB VERSION IN FULL-SCREEN MODE!!!

-------------------------------

What is it like to make unstable substances?

Just sit down, push the release buttons to add stuff to the machine.

Make sure to get the best result before the machine fills up!

Check the stability gauge for... You know... Safety reasons!!!!!
Green is good, Red is BAD!
